title: Keir Starmer – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Now Attending COP27
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on Twitter on 2 November 2022.
content:
Caving in to criticism is not leadership.
